dmca.title: Subpoena Report
dmca.body:
Verizon Online respects the privacy rights of our customers. Accordingly, we are sending you this notice to inform you that we have received a court issued subpoena which requires us to produce certain information regarding your Verizon Online account (including your name, address, telephone number, e-mail address and Media Access Control ("MAC") address). The case in which the subpoena has been issued is Screen Gems, et al. v. Does Civ. Action No. 05-1695, which is pending in federal court for the District of Columbia. 

This information has been subpoenaed by persons claiming to be the owner (or authorized representative of the owner) of copyrighted music, video, or software. The person requesting this information has alleged in a complaint filed with the court that your use of peer-to-peer technology may constitute an infringement of the rights of the the copyright owner, and you were identified as being user of IP 70.18.144.200 on 2005-03-27 00:31:51 EST.
